title.rendered: Why Should Your Company Should Have a Website?

content.rendered:
Many business owners are wondering about the same things when it comes to beginning an online presence for their business. “Why is it important for me to have a website?” “What are the benefits of having a website?” “What are the important things to consider when choosing a website designer?” All of these questions are very important and their answers lead to the conclusion that having an online presence for your business is a MUST have.

To answer the first question, “Why is it important for me to have a website?” According to the Pew Research Center for Internet, Science & Tech, “Today nearly two-thirds of Americans own a smartphone, and 19 percent of Americans rely to some degree on a smartphone for accessing online services and information and for staying connected to the world around them.” That is a large number of Americans using the internet to make purchases, book vacations, and get informed about companies they are looking to hire for their needs. Without a website, you are automatically out of the running as a choice and that is why it is important to have one. Get yourself in the running with a beautiful customized website that captivates potential customers and grabs their attention. Give your business a shining online presence.

“What are the benefits of having a website?” There are many benefits of having a website that you may have not considered. Maybe business is working fine for you, and it has for 30 years! So who needs a website anyway?! A website should be looked at as an online storefront for your business. The website becomes a place to tell your companies story, a place to showcase partners and affiliates, a central area to display your best testimonials and showcase photos of your best work. A website is a place where a potential customer can view all there is to know about your business from the comfort of their couch. These are just a few of the basic benefits of having a website for your business.

One of the most important questions! “What are the important things to consider when choosing a website designer?” When choosing a website designer, choose the company that will give you unbeatable customer service and allow you to be involved in the design process. Choose the company that you hear great things about. A great company will always provide references when asked. A credible website company with be more than happy to show you a portfolio of their past jobs on the internet for potential clients to view.
